Plot summary

A love drama of MaruÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¡a, an actress and Peter, a painter. He lives in a dark tiny rented room and she lives in a small flat. They both spend most of their time in a pub where they meet. A bright window to the future shown throughout the film seems to be moving further and further away
